name: reCAPTIVE
description:
reCAPTIVE is a game generated by an Artificial Intelligence that we called J̴͘͡a̵̕m͘b̡͢o̢̧t1̵̡͞8̕! It plays in a reCAPTCHA style interface, requiring the player to select icons that match the prompt they are given. J͠a͢m͢b̀ot18͡ generates out all of the puzzles and even the Unity project that it sits inside of. However, being a typical Global Game Jam game, there are a few bugs that we weren't able to fix before the games release. So we hope you'll forgive us (and J̷́͠a̕͢m̀b҉̴o̸͟t͞18̸͞) if the game is a little rough around the edges.

The Team!
Matthew Dyet - Programming, Design 
Ben White- Writing, Narrative Design
Jess Watson- User Interface, Design
Chris Head- Music

I hope that you'll play reCAPTIVE and be as surprised by J̷̡́am̢̨͢b͡o̢t̶́1̸͝8̸ as we were!
